question: Some people think that if a country is already rich, further economic development will not result in its citizens being any happier . to what extent do you agree or disagree.
text: There is no doubt that these days, economic advancement countries are not guaranteed a jubilant life for its inhabitants .The question is, does living In a rich state will contribute happiness and satisfaction life? In this essay, I am going to discuss my point of view in both aspects of advantages and disadvantages of being part of civilized country .

In terms of the positives side: prosperous land have a tremendous number of great opportunities for people .The main reason given to support this claim is, a lot of big and sophisticated businesses are investigating their works inside well-off counties. To illustrate, there are a  multiple choices to build a solid base for a flourishing future. In other words: it is easy to develop yourself and got a high occupation that will increase your income to live a facilitate life. In addition: developed countries provide a high education to your children, updated hospitals, Vacancy jobs that motivate you to be a healthier person, and a large number of enjoyment.

However, I believe that an immense amount of people do not like and appeal to being one of the inhabitants living in a rich and developed nation for many reasons. Firstly, sophisticated countries replace nature with huge buildings and towers. That is why they can not live without nature. Secondly, the congestion on roads and public places. Thirdly, they prefer to live a simple life .
ex: could get anything any time anywhere in a short time.

In conclude,i concur that a sophisticated countries are considered to be  a dream place for the majority of people. The well-off nations could help with long-term growth for themselves and their families future.
